A technician carries out an experiment, using the apparatus shown, to determine the half-life of a radioactive source.

A graph of the technician's measurements is as shown.

option_b: Take readings of the count rate every 60 seconds for 40 minutes.
option_c: Place lead shielding around the radioactive source.
option_d: Move the radioactive source closer to the Geiger-Müller tube.
option_e: Move the radioactive source further away from the Geiger-Müller tube.
